column2: "Ooh, so you think you're really good at using a rifle now, do you?"
"Well isn't that special? You're so sure of yourself. It must feel nice. But you know what? That's exactly the kind of thing that will get you killed."
"And if you die, that's one less person I can go on shooting sprees with. So how about we go do some shooting practice to keep us humble?"
"As long as YOU keep doing the killing, your opponents won't be able to kill you, right?"
"Okay okay, let's go let's go. Just remember, keep shooting and massacring those hostiles. After all, that's what we get paid for. Hee hee!"
